incident_updates.body: Start time : 01/09/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 01/09/2022 22:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a network maintenance on our backbone between Marseille and Singapore

Start time : 01/09/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 01/09/2022 23:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade for multiple network equipment.

Start time : 02/09/2022 01:00 UTC End time : 02/09/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : Some customers may experience some loss of service during the operations. Service improvement : A network equipment will be replaced.

Start time : 05/09/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 05/09/2022 08:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be carrying out a maintenance on the cooling system of the rack L115B16.

Start time : 14/09/2022 04:00 UTC End time : 14/09/2022 05:00 UTC Service impact : Interruption of network redundancy and decreased bandwidth for servers with LACP enabled during the maintenance. The maintenance has been postponed. Here is the new schedule : Start time : 14/09/2022 05:00 UTC End time : 14/09/2022 07:00 UTC
